name: 수달 부부
description: 귀여운 수달 커플 캐릭터 - 유튜브 쇼츠용 마스코트

characters.name: 남편 수달
characters.description: A cute male otter with soft brown fur, round friendly face, small black nose, and wearing a tiny blue bowtie. Pixar 3D animation style. The character has a slightly bigger build, warm brown eyes, and a gentle smile.
characters.distinguishingFeatures: blue bowtie, slightly bigger build, warm brown eyes

characters.name: 아내 수달
characters.description: A cute female otter with lighter brown fur, round adorable face, small pink nose, and wearing a pink ribbon on her head. Pixar 3D animation style. The character is slightly smaller, has big sparkling eyes, and a sweet smile.
characters.distinguishingFeatures: pink ribbon on head, slightly smaller, sparkling eyes
